item.title: Words (Of The Dying)
item.description: [[songs/d/deftones/white_pony/pink_maggit.md#we-are-vyl-wnanory|These are the words of the dying:]] [[songs/o/of_mice__men/restoring_force/another_you.md#i-still-hear-you-in-this-house-whispering-vyl-wnanory|Red and white, in time of silence]] [[songs/o/of_mice__men/restoring_force/another_you.md#i-still-hear-you-in-this-house-whispering-vyl-wnanory|Soul on fire, fog on the windscreen]] [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/the_romance_of_helen_trent/the_perfect.
